Uses of Class
library_management_system.Book

  • Uses of Book in library_management_system

    Methods in library_management_system that return types with arguments of type Book
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Book>
    Library.getAvailableBooks()
    Gets a list of available books in the library (books that have not been issued).
    List<Book>
    User.getBorrowedBooks()
    Gets the list of books currently borrowed by the user.
    List<Book>
    Library.searchBook(String title)
    Searches for books by title in the library collection.
    Methods in library_management_system with parameters of type Book
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Library.addBook(Book book)
    Adds a book to the library collection.
    void
    User.borrowBook(Book book)
    Borrows a book for the user, marking the book as issued.
    void
    Library.deleteBook(Book book)
    Removes a book from the library collection.
    void
    User.returnBook(Book book)
    Returns a borrowed book, marking it as available.
